body: Hi Claudio. The units of Ladybug is wrong in this case and it should be Wh/m2 in this case. We already know about this and it is an easy fix: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/62](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/62). The result is 0.07442 which will be equal to 0.1 if you round the value.
